alert.note: Alert for Clay; Knox; Laurel; McCreary; Pulaski; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:55PM EDT until June 17 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Northwestern Knox County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... McCreary County in south central Kentucky... Whitley County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 130 PM EDT. * At 1254 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Maplesville to near Blue Heron, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... London, Williamsburg, Manchester, Whitley City, Julip, Fariston, Cumberland Falls S.P., Zion Hill, Goose Rock, Mount Victory and Bush. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Knox; Laurel; McCreary; Pulaski; Whitley
